name: Run Whoami as Privileged User
description: Detects a whoami.exe executed by privileged accounts that are often misused by threat actors
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.User:*TrustedInstaller* AND (process.pe.original_file_name:whoami.exe OR process.executable:*\\whoami.exe))`
